original_text: Alas! for that day is great, so that none is like it: it is even the time of Jacob's trouble, but he shall be saved out of it.
korean_text: 슬프다 그 날이여 그와 같이 엄청난 날이 없으리라 그 날은 야곱의 환난의 때가 됨이로다 그러나 그가 환난에서 구하여 냄을 얻으리로다

sentences.original_text: so that none is like it
it is even the time of Jacob's trouble
but he shall be saved out of it
